name: Alien Escape - Arcade
description: The green, two-legged Alien Griz has been abducted from his home planet of Miz by a group of evil scientists who wish to experiment on him. You must help Griz find his way through the complex Lab that he is being held in and get him the green juice that is his life force in order for him to escape. Use the arrow keys to navigate and jump between the tricky platforms. Make sure to avoid the guards that are patrolling the facility, and don't fall!
